column4: I'm playing Unreal Tournament 2004, and I've set my Anti-Aliasing to 8x and my Antistropic to 16x via nvidia-settings. Yet I seriously doubt it's actually working, is UT2004 overriding my settings or something?
In general I find that UT never obeys the AF or AA settings.
Heh, I have the same card.  I turn all the settings pretty low.
